attributes.action: create a mechanism for the Speaker of the House of Commons to resign with Immediate Effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Speaker is the chief officer and highest authority of the House of Common, additionally all sides in the House rely on the Speaker's disinterest
and respect that he or she must stand aside from controversy (source: www.parliament.uk)
It is apparent that to date he has been unable to fulfill this role. Therefore for Parliament to regain the trust of the British people the Prime Minister should action the petition with immediate effect.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
